## Installation

You can install the released version of dinnR from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("dinnR")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(dinnR)
## basic example code
```
